full_summary:
### Request for Proposal
Title: TBIPS P.5 Project Executive (Spiect - P.5 Directeur de Projet)
Reference Number: PW-22-01009548
Tender Closing Date: November 4, 2022, 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Time)

#### Introduction
The Government of Canada, represented by Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC), invites firms with a valid TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) to submit a proposal for the provision of senior project executive consulting services. These services will support ECCC in the development, design, and delivery of project initiatives that align with the department’s strategic objectives.

#### Description of Work
The successful proposal will support senior project executive consulting services to provide guidance for numerous project initiatives. The work will be carried out on an "as and when requested" basis. The scope of work includes:

- Providing senior project executive consulting services to support ECCC’s project initiatives
- Ensuring projects are developed, designed, and delivered in a timely and effective manner to meet ECCC’s strategic objectives

#### Security Requirements
The following security requirements must be met:

- Designated Organization Screening (DOS) - Protected B for the contractor
- Reliability for individual resources

#### Eligibility
This requirement is open to firms with a valid TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) who have qualified for Tier 1 services in the National Capital Region for the category of Three (3) Level 3 Project Executives.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on the following criteria:

- Technical capability
- Past performance
- Security requirements

#### Proposal Submission
Firms interested in submitting a proposal should contact Aurora Hudson, Contracting Authority, at aurora.hudson@ec.gc.ca.

#### Important Notice
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.

#### Download RFP Documents
RFP documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement. The documents can be downloaded from the following links:

- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/01/23867d7d22bc296b5ed17f6e53f837b5/5000065901_002_npp.pdf
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/20/
